creditline: Lent by the Wang Xing Lou Collection
medium: Porcelain with carved decoration under a bluish-green celadon glaze
text: The <I>guanyao<I>, or official, ware of the Southern Song (1127-1279) court inspired the shape of these vases. Ultimately, however, their form derives from ancient bronze <I>hu<I> vessels of the Shang dynasty (1766-1122 B.C.).
title: Celadon Hu-shaped Vase
